DOC.brief_summary: This study target woman moderate depression pregnancy . We aim investigate direct effect newborn child long term consequence cognitive developement child who´s mother treated CBT alone combination antidepressant .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Consequences Mother Child From Treatment Depression
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective study direct neonatal effect long-term consequence cognitive development child prenatal expose maternal sertraline treatment compare exposure maternal depression treat ICBT .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Female > 18 year old 2 . Pregnant , gestational week 917 . 3 . Verified moderate depression accord SCIDI without concomitant anxiety disorder . 4 . Signed informed consent 5 . Able understand Swedish language orally write able use internet ICBT , include succeded filling online questionnaire 6 . Are willing participate study visit 7 . Plans give birth Department Obstetrics Karolinska University Hospital , Huddinge additional study site Norrland University Hospital ( NUS ) , Umeå 1 . Known drug alcohol abuse 2 . Serious psychiatric disorder psychosis , bipolar disorder , severe personality disorder , ADHD/ADD , autism mental retardation ) severe melancholic psychotic depression . 3 . Known idiosyncrasy Zoloft allergy one Zoloft excipients 4 . Ongoing medication SSRI , SNRI , TCA , moodstabilizers , antiepileptic drug , psychotropic drug , tramadol , propafenon , tolbutamid , flekainid , psychostimulants atomoxetine , insulin steroid 5 . Any severe somatic disease necessitate regular treatment systemic steroid , severe heart lung disease , kidney disease , liver disease , diabetes mellitus , epilepsy drug treatment . 6 . Women either screen treatment selfassessment form ( MADRSS : 4 point question suicidal ideation ( question 9 ) ) report symptom severe suicidal thought suicide plan contact structure suicide risk assessment telephone ( experienced staff unit internet psychiatry accord clinical routine ) . If judge necessary patient book psychiatric assessment study nurse . If acute assessment care judge necessary , referral psychiatric emergency department make accord routine regular care . Also woman , contact study personal report symptom suicidal thought suicide plan receive psychiatric assessment specify . Women accord psychiatric assessment high suicidal risk exclude study . These woman actively transfer necessary psychiatric treatment usual . 7 . Other factor clinical significant could jeopardize study result intention , judge study psychiatrist study obstetrician
